product_name: Isis Mila Car Coat - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Isis Mila soft-shell Car Coat lets you snuggle into the warm collar and cuffs, and stay protected by the longer length on your night out. Soft-shell fabric provides breathability and 4-way stretch; durable water repellent finish rebuffs wind and drizzle. Long silhouette with full-length zipper and asymmetric crossover snap flap at the chest protects you against the elements. Soft internal rib-knit collar and cuffs add extra insulation. Isis Mila Car Coat for women has zippered hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: The Isis Mila soft-shell Car Coat lets you snuggle into the warm collar and cuffs, and stay protected by the longer length on your night out.
